title: Djinn
description: Sasha gives Cindy a rare book, trying to impress the lady he's set his sights on. The second Cindy touches Djinn, her life begins to change. Within hours the forces of darkness infiltrate her life, and as luck would have it she runs straight to Sasha for help. In a fast paced noir romance the couple face supernatural horrors, splintering their sentience, causing ruin and discontent. Cindy has a personality change, her quirky disposition becoming brooding and nasty. Sasha is a new-age hippie, taking Cindy through exorcisms and sweat lodges to free her from this terror. Djinn is a rare evil artifact, possessing the reader, leaving Cindy and her life in carnage. This romance is fraught with upheaval and tension.
author: Poppet
